mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , CHANGE_NAME AS "CONTENTIMG1" , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE" FROM EVENT E JOIN EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (EVENT_NO = REF_ENO) WHERE E.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND START_DATE IS NULL OR END_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT EVENT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , CHANGE_NAME AS "CONTENTIMG1" , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE" FROM EVENT E JOIN EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (EVENT_NO = REF_ENO) WHERE E.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT EVENT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , CHANGE_NAME AS "CONTENTIMG1" , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE"
FROM EVENT E JOIN EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (EVENT_NO = REF_ENO) WHERE E.EVENT_STATUS = #{eventStatus} AND E.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT EVENT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE" , EVENT_CONTENT , EVENT_TYPE FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT EVENT_FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM EVENT_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT REPLY_NO , USER_ID AS "REPLY_WRITER" , REPLY_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REF_ENO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_ERNO.NEXTVAL, #{refEno}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent})
INSERT INTO APPLICANT(APPLICANT_NO, REF_ENO, USER_NO, APPLICATION_DATE, WIN_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{refEno}, #{userNo}, SYSDATE, 'W')

INSERT INTO EVENT(EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_ENO.NEXTVAL, #{eventTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{eventContent}, #{eventType}, #{eventStatus})

INSERT INTO EVENT_ATTACHMENT(EVENT_FILE_NO, REF_ENO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_EFNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ENO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_NO , CHANGE_NAME AS "CONTENTIMG1" , EVENT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-') "END_DATE" , E.EVENT_STATUS , E.STATUS FROM EVENT E JOIN EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (EVENT_NO = REF_ENO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT EVENT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE" , EVENT_CONTENT , EVENT_TYPE , EVENT_STATUS , CHANGE_NAME AS "CONTENTIMG1" FROM EVENT JOIN EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (EVENT_NO = REF_ENO) WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT EVENT_FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM EVENT_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 2

SELECT REPLY_NO , USER_ID AS "REPLY_WRITER" , REPLY_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT APPLICANT_NO , EVENT_TITLE , USER_ID AS "USER_NO" , TO_CHAR(APPLICATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') AS "APPLICATION_DATE" FROM APPLICANT A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN EVENT E ON (A.REF_ENO = E.EVENT_NO) WHERE REF_ENO = #{eventNo} AND WIN_STATUS = 'W'
